welcome_message_body: Welcome to Centreville, where small-town charm meets big-city convenience! Enjoy our historic downtown, vibrant local shops, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as JetBlue and United.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines and Southwest.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and charter flights at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, gift shops, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
